mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PORTFOLIO ( USER_ID, STOCK_ID, SHORT_CODE, PRICE, QUANTITY, MEMO, ORDER_TYPE, ORDERED_AT) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{stockId}, #{shortCode}, #{portfolioDTO.price}, #{portfolioDTO.quantity}, #{portfolioDTO.memo}, #{portfolioDTO.orderType}, #{portfolioDTO.orderedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE PORTFOLIO SET PRICE = #{portfolioDTO.price}, QUANTITY = #{portfolioDTO.quantity}, MEMO = #{portfolioDTO.memo}, ORDER_TYPE = #{portfolioDTO.orderType}, ORDERED_AT = #{portfolioDTO.orderedAt} WHERE PORTFOLIO_ID = #{portfolioId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.STOCK_NAME, SUM(CASE WHEN o.ORDER_TYPE = 'B' THEN o.QUANTITY ELSE -o.QUANTITY END) AS total_quantity, SUM(CASE WHEN o.ORDER_TYPE = 'B' THEN o.QUANTITY * o.PRICE ELSE -o.QUANTITY * o.PRICE END) AS total_price FROM `PORTFOLIO` o JOIN `STOCK` s ON o.STOCK_ID = s.STOCK_ID WHERE o.USER_ID =#{userId} GROUP BY s.STOCK_NAME;
